count_null_.description: Counts the number of null values in the specified column.

col.description: Name of the column to count from.

returns.description: The number of null values in the column.

count_zero_.description: Counts the number of zero values in the specified column.

col.description: Name of the column to count from.

returns.description: The number of zero values in the column.

count_unique_.description: Counts the number of unique values in the specified column.

col.description: Name of the column to count from.

returns.description: The number of unique values in the column.

wunique_.description: Returns a dataframe object with a count of unique values in the specified column.

col.description: Name of the column to select from.

colname.description:
Name of the new column containing the unique counts.
Defaults to "Number".
